description: This source file appears to be the main implementation file for the AppGateway plugin in a larger C++ project, containing code for the core functionality of the plugin. It includes references to multiple related implementation files and defines classes, methods, and external dependencies that are part of the plugin's implementation.
external_methods: c++ compilation commands indicating functions invoked within these files
standard C++ library functions linked through these files

classes.description: Coordinates the resolution of service requests or dependencies within the plugin.
